meaning_str.bing:
v. 忘记；遗忘；忘记做（或带、买等）；不再想
网络. 忽略；忘却；忘掉

忘记；遗忘；忘记做（或带、买等）；不再想

忘记；遗忘；疏忽；忽略；忘掉；忘记做（或带、买等）；不记得；不再想起；不必在意；不再把…放在心上；不再考虑…的可能；（举止）不得体

sogou-CET4.v: 忘记[出现25次)];(forget oneself)忘乎所以; 不得体[出现1次)]

1.en: This time tell me really very effective, I will be very easy to forget that this is the week.
1.cn: 这样的日子告诉我果然很有效果，我会很容易的忘记今天是星期几。

2.en: No matter where you are, don't forget how much I love you.
2.cn: 不管你在哪里，不要忘了我有多么爱你。

3.en: Yes, they may seem to have more 'authority' than people down the line, but never forget, no one enjoys absolute power.
3.cn: 是的，他们似乎有更多的权力的人比下来，但不会忘记，谁拥有绝对的权力。

0.en: I'll never forget it. You won't? I feel changed myself.
0.cn: 我永远都不会忘记。是吗？我自己也被改变了。

1.en: I wanted to forget you. I wanted Coco to forget you too, but... This is my fault. Not yours. I'm sorry, Imelda.
1.cn: 我多想忘记你，我多想可可也忘记你，但是...这都是我的错，不怪你，对不起，伊梅尔达。

2.en: I know that you will never forget Harvard, and Harvard will never forget you, especially during the next fundraising drive.
2.cn: 我知道 你们永远不会忘记哈佛，哈佛也不会忘记你们，特别是在下次募集捐款的时候。

3.en: Alaric will compel away any memories and then make me forget that I had him do it.
3.cn: 阿拉里克会催眠我忘记一切，然后再让我忘记我让他做过这件事。

4.en: But you understand how hard it is to forget about this.
4.cn: 但你们了解这件事很难忘记吧。

5.en: I got to call her before I forget how I said it.
5.cn: 我要在忘记怎么演之前，赶快打给佩妮。

6.en: You don't have to forgive him. But we shouldn't forget him.
6.cn: 你不用原谅他，但我们不能忘记他。

7.en: Please I don't want that to go away. I don't want to forget.
7.cn: 求你我不想失去这种感觉，我不想忘记。

8.en: Oh, before I forget, are you coming to Mike's piano bar tonight?
8.cn: 差点忘记，你今晚会去麦克的钢琴酒吧吗？

9.en: It's just like riding a bike, Daddy Pig. You never forget.
9.cn: 这就像骑自行车一样，猪爸爸。你永远不会忘记。

10.en: But you forget he occupied Wall Street for six straight weeks.
10.cn: 但你忘记他参与了整整六周的占领华尔街运动。

11.en: I want you guys to forget everything you think you know about The Games.
11.cn: 我要你们忘记自己对比赛的任何猜测和认知。

12.en: I have a need to confess, but you, I think, might have a need to forget.
12.cn: 我需要坦白，而你们，我认为，也许需要忘记。

13.en: I just want you to know last night I'll never forget it. Neither will I.
13.cn: 我想告诉你昨晚我永远都不会忘记的。我也不会。

14.en: Because I know you're working on stuff, but I never want you to forget who you are, and what makes you wonderful.
14.cn: 因为我知道你在努力改变自己，但我不想让你忘记自己的本来的样子，不想让你忘记真正使你出众的东西。

15.en: What you're about to hear me say may horrify you, but you will forget it.
15.cn: 我下面要说的话也许会吓到你们，但是你们会忘记的。

16.en: Oh, and don't forget, J., you owe me. You know, I've got a better idea.
16.cn: 还有别忘记了，J，你答应我的哦。我有个更好的主意。

17.en: I will never forget about her. That's a good boy! Good boy! Thank you, Zay.
17.cn: 我永远不会忘记她。真是我的乖孩子，乖孩子。谢谢你，小赛。

18.en: Ay, Alex, you were the first one to reach out to me, and I will never forget that.
18.cn: 艾丽克斯，你是第一个向我示好的人，我永远不会忘记的。

19.en: What tag? There's a tag on my fin! How could you forget you have a tag on your fin?
19.cn: 什么标签？我的鳍上有标签？你怎么会忘记你的鳍上有标签？
